Boots.description:
+25 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, polymorphs, and immobilizes by 35%.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Boots.name: Mercury's Treads
Boots.plaintext: Increases Movement Speed and reduces duration of disabling effects
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +25 Magic Resist UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, polymorphs, and immobilizes by 35%. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Boots.description:
+15 Magic Penetration

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.)

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Boots.name: Sorcerer's Shoes
Boots.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and magic damage
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +15 Magic Penetration UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed (Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.) (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Boots.description:
UNIQUE Passive: +15% Cooldown Reduction
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.''
Boots.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
Boots.plaintext: Increases Movement Speed and Cooldown Reduction
Boots.sanitizedDescription: UNIQUE Passive: +15% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.) ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.''

Elixirs.description:
Level 9 required to purchase.

Click to Consume: Grants 25% increased Size, Slow Resistance, Tenacity and Path of Iron for 3 minutes.

Path of Iron: Moving leaves a path behind that boosts allied champion's Movement Speed by 15%.

(Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)
Elixirs.name: Elixir of Iron
Elixirs.plaintext: Temporarily reduces the power of enemy crowd control effects. Leaves a trail for allies to follow.
Elixirs.sanitizedDescription: Level 9 required to purchase. Click to Consume: Grants 25% increased Size, Slow Resistance, Tenacity and Path of Iron for 3 minutes. Path of Iron: Moving leaves a path behind that boosts allied champion's Movement Speed by 15%. (Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)

Elixirs.description:
Level 9 required to purchase.

Click to Consume: Grants +250 Health, 15% Bonus Damage to Towers and Siege Commander for 3 minutes.

Siege Commander: Nearby minions gain 15% Bonus Damage to Towers and gain Movement Speed based on champion's Movement Speed.

(Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)
Elixirs.name: Elixir of Ruin
Elixirs.plaintext: Temporarily grants Health and boosts the speed and power of nearby minions versus Towers.
Elixirs.sanitizedDescription: Level 9 required to purchase. Click to Consume: Grants +250 Health, 15% Bonus Damage to Towers and Siege Commander for 3 minutes. Siege Commander: Nearby minions gain 15% Bonus Damage to Towers and gain Movement Speed based on champion's Movement Speed. (Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)

Endgame Items.description:
+300 Health
+400 Mana
+60 Ability Power

Passive: Grants +20 Health, +40 Mana, and +4 Ability Power per stack (max +200 Health, +400 Mana, and +40 Ability Power). Grants 1 stack per minute (max 10 stacks).
UNIQUE Passive - Valor's Reward: Upon leveling up, restores 150 Health and 200 Mana over 8 seconds.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Endgame Items.name: Rod of Ages
Endgame Items.plaintext: Greatly increases Health, Mana, and Ability Power
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +300 Health +400 Mana +60 Ability Power Passive: Grants +20 Health, +40 Mana, and +4 Ability Power per stack (max +200 Health, +400 Mana, and +40 Ability Power). Grants 1 stack per minute (max 10 stacks). UNIQUE Passive - Valor's Reward: Upon leveling up, restores 150 Health and 200 Mana over 8 seconds. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Endgame Items.description:
+90 Armor
+20% Cooldown Reduction
+400 Mana

UNIQUE Aura: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies by 15%.
Endgame Items.name: Frozen Heart
Endgame Items.plaintext: Massively increases Armor and slows enemy basic attacks
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +90 Armor +20% Cooldown Reduction +400 Mana UNIQUE Aura: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies by 15%.

Endgame Items.description:
+120 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Increases Ability Power by 35%.
Endgame Items.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +120 Ability Power UNIQUE Passive: Increases Ability Power by 35%.

Endgame Items.description:
+70 Ability Power
+50 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Aura: Reduces the Magic Resist of nearby enemies by 20.
Endgame Items.name: Abyssal Scepter
Endgame Items.plaintext: Reduces Magic Resist of nearby enemies
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +70 Ability Power +50 Magic Resist UNIQUE Aura: Reduces the Magic Resist of nearby enemies by 20.

Endgame Items.description:
+400 Health
+100 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Damaging spells and abilities apply a Movement Speed reduction to enemies based on the spell type:

Single Target: 40% reduction for 1.5 seconds.
Area of Effect: 40% reduction for 1 seconds
Damage over Time or Multi-hit: 20% reduction for 1 seconds.
Summoned Minions: 20% reduction for 1 seconds.

(If a spell fits in more than one category, it uses the weakest slow value.)
Endgame Items.name: Rylai's Crystal Scepter
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +400 Health +100 Ability Power UNIQUE Passive: Damaging spells and abilities apply a Movement Speed reduction to enemies based on the spell type: Single Target: 40% reduction for 1.5 seconds. Area of Effect: 40% reduction for 1 seconds Damage over Time or Multi-hit: 20% reduction for 1 seconds. Summoned Minions: 20% reduction for 1 seconds. (If a spell fits in more than one category, it uses the weakest slow value.)

Endgame Items.description:
+100 Ability Power
+10% Movement Speed

UNIQUE Passive: Gain charges upon moving or casting. At 100 charges, the next spell hit expends all charges to deal 100 (+10% AP) bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit.
Endgame Items.name: Luden's Echo
Endgame Items.plaintext: Increases Ability Power and Movement Speed
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +100 Ability Power +10% Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive: Gain charges upon moving or casting. At 100 charges, the next spell hit expends all charges to deal 100 (+10% AP) bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit.

Endgame Items.description:
+400 Health
+60 Magic Resist
+150% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Increases all healing received by 20%.
Endgame Items.name: Spirit Visage
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +400 Health +60 Magic Resist +150% Base Health Regen +10% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive: Increases all healing received by 20%.

Jungle Items.description:
+30 Bonus Gold per Large Monster Kill
Passive - Chilling Smite: Smite can be cast on enemy champions, dealing reduced true damage and stealing 20% movement speed for 2 seconds.

Passive - Jungler: Deal 45 additional magic damage to monsters over 2 seconds and gain 10 Health Regen and 5 Mana Regen per second while under attack from neutral monsters.

Limited to 1 Jungle item
Jungle Items.name: Stalker's Blade
Jungle Items.sanitizedDescription: +30 Bonus Gold per Large Monster Kill Passive - Chilling Smite: Smite can be cast on enemy champions, dealing reduced true damage and stealing 20% movement speed for 2 seconds. Passive - Jungler: Deal 45 additional magic damage to monsters over 2 seconds and gain 10 Health Regen and 5 Mana Regen per second while under attack from neutral monsters. Limited to 1 Jungle item

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 1 Trinket.

Active: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 60 seconds (120 second cooldown).

At level 9, this ward's duration increases to 120 seconds.

Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player.

(Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).
Starting Items.name: Warding Totem (Trinket)
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 Trinket. Active: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 60 seconds (120 second cooldown). At level 9, this ward's duration increases to 120 seconds. Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player. (Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).

Passive: Restores 4 Mana upon killing a unit.
